UC IRVINE - ICS 227 User Interfaces and Software Engineering

Assignments

Presentations/Assginments

  • Project Bid - Written Assignment - 2 pages due Tuesday Week 3
  • Platform Discussion - In Class Group Presentation - Weeks 4, 5, 6
  • Project Update - Brief Demonstration - Weeks 6&7
  • Final Project Report with Code and Demonstration - Due Finals Week
